resources.string: where you can easily keep your studies on track

By default, messages are sent with normal priority. This optimizes the client app\'s battery consumption (Doze). There may be a short delay in receiving the notification. With high priority the notification can wake a sleeping device and is received immediately.

Indication of how much of the user\'s valuable attention should be consumed by this notification. Low-priority notifications may be hidden from the user in certain situations, while the user might be interrupted for a higher-priority notification. The system sets a notification\'s priority based on various factors including the setPriority value. The effect may differ slightly on different platforms.
The notification channel has already been created. The priority can only be changed in the Application Info Notification Settings
